attributes.action: Stop Nick Clegg getting a Knighthood
attributes.background: Please help parliment stop Nick Clegg getting at Knighthood. This is the man who betrayed millennials over tuition fees. The oath-breaker who reneged on his promise at the smallest whiff of power and co-presided over the trebling of tertiary education tuition fees. He is also an arch europhile.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments.
